function.note: Suite of programs for small molecule crystallography, direct method and refinement. Also, Macromolecular crystallography programs for experimental phasing and restraint refinement. Substructure determination (SHELXD) and initial phasing as well as phase improvement (SHELXE) geared towards very fast indication of quality of resulting phases (maps). Restrained (high resolution) refinement in SHELXL.
